StudInfos.DreamJob: CFO of a medium sized company

EmpInfos.CompanyDescription: CRST is one of the nation’s largest privately-held transportation companies. We provide a broad array of transportation and logistics solutions including expedited, flatbed, dedicated, and final mile. We tailor each solution to our clients’ unique needs and focus on delivering superior service.
EmpInfos.WhyWork: Employee satisfaction surveys give CRST high marks and our compensation packages are some of the best in our industry.

Positions.PositionDescription: We are looking for am employee who can help us keep track of our expenses and find ways in which to use keep our financial data safe.
Positions.LookingFor: We pride ourselves in having many long-time employees. We look are team members who will be a good fit for our company and help us to continue to excell in the logistics industry.

EmpInfos.CompanyDescription: Homesteaders Life Company provides products and services to promote and support the funding of advance funeral planning and end-of-life expenses.
EmpInfos.WhyWork: Apply for a position at Homesteaders if you want to work for a company that treats its employees like family and where there is much opportuntiy for advancement.
